description:
Tired of never finishing a movie or paying for unused subscriptions? 

Watch ReelShort — Every Second is Drama

Say hello to ReelShort, a next-gen HD streaming short movie platform offering exclusive vertical TV mini series. Recognized by Times100 for our movie reels innovation in the entertainment industry, we're changing the way you watch movies with our one-minute short movie episodes that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere, all from the convenience of your phone with the ReelShort App.

Choose from our TV mini series library packed with endless addictive movie shorts added daily, from romantic encounters with billionaires and heart-wrenching tragedies to epic comeback stories and more—you won't ever be short on short movie entertainment!

Featured Shows:
[Don't Miss Me When I'm Gone] After losing my parents, I move in with my godmother, Aunt Sandra. I live under her roof with her two sons-the Miller brothers-surrounded by love and care. I think I’ll end up with one of them. But everything changes when the maid’s daughter, Lola, moves in. The Miller brother I love most breaks my heart into pieces. After I leave, they lose their minds trying to find me.

[Move Aside! I'm the Final Boss] Kingsley is the secret King of King's Corps and the richest man on Earth, but when he returns from the battlefield, his childhood sweetheart brutally dumps him, thinking he's a clown. How will the King of all men make her regret it?

Here's why you'll love ReelShort:

Bite-sized original movie shorts designed for on-the-go viewing
•Exclusive short movies with juicy vertical content that will keep you hooked
•New TV mini series added daily, with hundreds of new episodes each month
•Hollywood-quality entertainment, crafted for the big screen delivered to your small screen
•The first ever interactive live action short movies, where you decide what happens next
Experience the future of short movie entertainment, one minute at a time — download ReelShort now!

"Crazy Maple Studio is quietly changing the streaming game with its ReelShort app." - Time100 

"The biggest player in this new genre is ReelShort." - New York Times

"Every minute has a hook that keeps you watching." - Wall Street Journal

"ReelShort, which has dozens of shows — similarly light on character development and packed with curveballs — made for binge-watching in minutes." - Washington Post

Follow Us on Social Media

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/reelshortapp
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/reelshortapp
YouTube: https://youtube.com/@reelshortapp
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@reelshortapp
ReelShort's  Website: https://www.reelshort.com 

Notice:
If you subscribe through Apple, the payment will be deducted from your App Store account upon purchase confirmation.
Subscription privileges: While your subscription is active, you can watch all tv mini series for free.
Your subscription will take effect within 24 hours after purchase, depending on the status of your order in the Apple Store. The subscription is valid for 7 days.
Auto-Renewal: Your subscription will automatically renew. You will be charged within 24 hours before the start of each subscription period until you cancel your subscription.
Cancellation: On iOS devices, you can cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the next renewal date by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > View Apple ID > Subscriptions > ReelShort.
The subscription is billed weekly. The actual price may vary by region.

Flare Flow:  Binge-Worthy Short Dramas in Minutes.

Tired of long, boring movies? Flare Flow brings you the future of entertainment: high-impact, bite-sized dramas designed to captivate you in minutes. Immerse yourself in a world where every second counts and every story leaves you breathless.

What Awaits You:

1.Exclusive & Original Stories You Won't Find Anywhere Else
Discover a vast library of constantly updated content. From heart-wrenching romance drama to edge-of-your-seat suspense thriller, we have diverse genres for every mood.

    "Mothering My Husband's Bastard": She nearly died giving birth, only to find her husband celebrating with his mistress. Now they want her fortune and her life. But they just provoked the wrong woman.

    "From Janitor to Mrs. Billionaire": She secretly married her boss… and now cleans his office. As his secretary bullies her daily, how long can she keep her explosive secret?

    "99 Charms, 99 Heartbreaks": Framed and left with nothing, a songwriter finds strength in a fake engagement. Will this new partnership heal her old wounds, or is love just another song she can't finish?

2.Crystal-Clear HD Quality & Seamless Streaming
Enjoy an unbeatable viewing experience with premium HD quality. Stream online smoothly, anytime anywhere, and get lost in the story, not in the loading screens.

3.Your Personal Drama Hub, Always Updated
We bring you non-stop fun with trending reels and drama hits. Get personalized recommendations for your next binge-watch obsession, with new cliffhanger episodes added daily.

Join millions of viewers worldwide who have made Flare Flow their go-to for short-form drama.

Download now and start your next dramatic adventure! Free to watch.

Privacy Policy: https://flareflow.tv/policy.html
User Agreement: https://flareflow.tv/terms.html

description:
GoodShort: a must-have app for original dramas and movies

To enjoy original short dramas and movies of a minute or so, anytime, anywhere, whether in travel, at home, or at a restaurant

We have a myriad of short dramas and movies adapted from novels with high quality, high definition, and high update frequency, guaranteeing a different screen experience for you.

[Diverse, all-inclusive content]
There are a lot of short dramas and reels adapted from novels, definitely something fascinating to you. From modern romance, urban romance, and youth romance to live-in sons-in-law, magic doctors, CEOs, billionaires, queens, and gods of war, all your favorite genres and themes can be found here!

[A personalized list of works you may like]
The excellent recommendation system will help you find the best originals, short dramas, and short movies adapted from the hottest novels, meeting the preferences of all kinds of drama and movie lovers!

[A user-friendly, elegant interface]
The simple, clear, user-friendly interface is an ergonomic fit for your eyes.

[Smooth experience]
Smooth streaming, as well as the comfortable interface design, will give you unparalleled viewing enjoyment. The high-quality content output provides a rich, high-definition, smooth, and flawless screen experience.

[Unlimited resources, super fast updates]
The selected, diversified content will satisfy your viewing needs for different content. Subscribe to your favorite works to keep up with the latest updates of your favorite dramas.

Whether you want to relax or pass the time while waiting, GoodShort is the best choice for you. Download it and start exploring!

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodShort to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

We are looking forward to hearing your comments and ideas. Please email us at contact@goodshort.com

Service Agreement:https://m.goodreels.com/other/static_file/term_of_use.html
Privacy Policy:https://m.goodreels.com/other/static_file/privacy_policy.html

Looking for the most talked about TV programmes and films from the around the world? They’re all on Netflix.

We’ve got award-winning series, films, documentaries and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute or just take a break.

What you’ll love about Netflix:
• We add TV programmes and films all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favourites, and stream videos straight to your device.

WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

Who's the imposter among your friends?
Imposter is the ultimate party game of bluffing, guessing, and social deduction. Grab 3-5 friends, sit around one device, and find out who’s lying.

How to Play:
1- All players see the same secret word—except one.
2- The imposter only sees the word “Imposter.”
3- One by one, players say a word related to the secret word.
4- The imposter must fake it and try to blend in without knowing the word.
5- Keep giving words and talking until someone thinks they've figured it out.

Fun, fast, and full of suspicion—perfect for game nights, road trips, or hanging out with friends.

Features:
- Play locally with 3 to 15 friends
- 10+ categories like food, movies, jobs, and more
- 500+ unique words and growing
- No accounts, no setup—just start playing
- Great for all ages—kids, teens, and adults

Built for laughs, bluffing, and epic "aha!" moments

Download now and start your next Imposter showdown!

https://imposterwho.com/terms
https://imposterwho.com/privacy

As a DStv customer you can enjoy the shows, movies and sport you love with the DStv app. Download now and get watching!
 
Never miss your favourite TV shows, sports team or breaking news with the DStv app, watch live on your iPhone, iPad or Apple TV; catch up on the latest episodes and movies or download to watch offline later on your mobile app.
 
As a DStv customer you can enjoy all of these features on the DStv app.
- Watch it as it happens, tune in and start live streaming selected TV channels via 3G/4G or WIFI.
- Missed it live, catch it later by watching a selection of the most popular shows, sport highlights, and movies on Catch Up.
- Don’t want to use mobile data to watch shows or movies, download up to 25 videos on Catch Up while on WIFI to enjoy offline later across 4 mobile devices.
- Want your own experience based on the sport, shows and movies you like to watch, setup up to 6 profiles to personalise each family members viewing experience.
- Want to plan your viewing in advance, add Catch Up items to your watchlist to come back to later or access the full 8-day TV Guide and set reminders to arrange your viewing.
- Need to keep the kids entertained, our Kids section on the mobile app is a safe and fun viewing environment with PIN controlled access so your kids can enjoy the coolest shows and movies unattended.
 
The DStv mobile app gives you the freedom to watch your best-loved DStv entertainment when you’re on the move.
 
If you don’t have DStv, no problem, just download the app, sign-up, and start watching our selection of free live streaming channels and video on your iPhone, iPad or Apple TV (available in South Africa only). As long as you’ve got the data, you’re good to go.
 
*The Live TV and Catch Up content on the DStv app will be as per your subscription package and country. Due to geo-blocking this content can only be played within the countries in the DStv territories.

WATCH THE MOST POPULAR AND TOP-RATED ANIME ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
Stream new episodes, classic favorites, and anime movies with the Crunchyroll app—watch for free or upgrade for an ad-free experience. Whether you love action-packed anime, heartwarming slice-of-life stories, or fantasy adventures, Crunchyroll offers the largest anime collection online, featuring a massive library of anime shows and movies available on your favorite device. Watch anime legally, free, and in high quality—all in one place.

ACCESS SERIES FROM FUNIMATION, WAKANIM, AND VRV
Crunchyroll now includes content previously available on Funimation, Wakanim, and VRV, bringing even more anime to one platform. Enjoy a seamless experience with expanded libraries, making Crunchyroll the ultimate destination for anime streaming.

EXCLUSIVE MUSIC VIDEOS AND CONCERTS
Get access to thousands of music videos, concert exclusives, and special performances from top artists worldwide. Watch unique behind-the-scenes footage, live performances, and carefully curated playlists that bring anime soundtracks and J-pop sensations to your screen.

APP FEATURES  
■ Watch anime subbed and dubbed—choose from multiple languages (dub availability varies).

Hey, we’re Hannes & Jeremy.

We’ve been there: Every game night starts with googling rules, grabbing pens and paper, or trying random apps. But there’s just no really good party app. So we decided to build one.

Our goal? Bring the best and most viral party games together in one place. For example: Who’s the Impostor? - you’ve probably seen it on TikTok or Insta.

Easy to learn. Quick to play. Perfect for 3 to 12 people.

Great for house parties, birthdays, or your next night with friends. Gather your crew - and have fun.

The app is free to enjoy with your friends! For some extra features, Splash Plus gives you full access with a weekly subscription. You can check out our Terms, EULA, and Privacy Policy here: https://cranberry.app/terms. 

Please note: This app is not intended for use as a drinking game and contains no alcohol-related content. It is suitable for all audiences seeking fun, social gameplay.

Cheers and enjoy the app!

Partyapp – a forward-thinking Mauritian startup – is revolutionizing the way people engage with parties and events by simplifying how they discover, book, and attend these experiences. We feature the most premium festivals, the most sought-out live concerts, chic club nights & intimate gatherings.

From exclusive beach parties to high-energy festivals, Partyapp promotes the best events across Mauritius with a seamless ticketing solution. Stay updated on upcoming events, grab your tickets in just a few taps, and get real-time updates on everything happening around you.

Join the Partyapp community today and immerse yourself in the dynamic events industry of Mauritius!

No matter where you are, you can watch the most popular mini-series anytime on MoboReels with an immersive viewing experience.

--Featured Short Drama--
[Frozen Wife, Unfrozen Revenge]
Audrey was the lead researcher on a cryogenics experiment, but her project lacked enough volunteer participants. After four years of hard work and enduring her husband's betrayal, she decided to take part in the experiment herself. She was frozen for ten years and left behind a fake death certificate for her husband. When he discovered her supposed death, he was heartbroken. A decade later, when he finally found her, Audrey was very much alive and had already entered into a relationship with the person who truly loved her.

You can explore popular genres such as romance, fantasy, martial arts, and time travel with just a tap. All the exciting mini-series are licensed and authorized. New episodes are updated daily and new series are released weekly, allowing you to immerse yourself in a world of imagination.

1. Powerful playback engine ensures your smooth viewing;
2. Extensive selection of series across various categories always cater to your favorites;
3. Build-in subtitles and adjustable playback speed for binge-watching;

IN-APP PURCHASE, SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS:
We offer non-consumable in-app purchase and auto-renewing subscription options:
- Subscriptions length: monthly, Yearly
- These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- You will be able to access the full feature of the app for the duration of the subscription
- Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original "one month" unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen package.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period
- You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription setting through your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged. Please visit http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098 for more information
- You may turn off the auto-renewal of your subscription via your iTunes Account Settings. However, you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period
- Any unused portion of a free-trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.
